name: COSMOQUANTUM
description:
WELCOME!!

Do you feel normal? Do you insist every day on being normal? But if you are here your identity has been questioned, do not worry, do not panic, the committee for the propagation of Cosmoquantum Social Psychology, CPCQSP, will help you recover your fantastic identity. We use identities everyday, with everyone we meet, do not let yours be questioned and stolen, do not let it be forgotten or silenced, join our interactive self help program and create a fantastic identity TODAY!

This game was created during the year of the pandemic, the year 2020. Its purpose is to reach a large number of desperate, crisis-ridden, bored beings and help them recover their essence. Human existence has become absurd, we still have time to change it. The Committee for the Propagation of Cosmoquantum Social Psychology, CPCQSP, can help you, only your participation is required.

Accept the challenge! The path to normality is fun and complex at the same time: you have lost your identity, however you will have to recover it by going through these 36 labyrinths, that will bring you one by one the most important existential elements of your being. The CQSP table shows internal and external scales of the individual. The table is an idea, a concept, which is formed from an incessant and constant drip of information, which in turn forms a huge pool of wisdom available to anyone who needs it.

Your return to normalcy awaits:

  • 36+ LABYRINTHS.
  • Over 60 different conflicts, all of which will help you heal the most damaged part of your mind, which is you.
  • More than 45 entities, physical/twisted representations of the ghosts and monsters that we feed every day - fear, shame, courtship, failure...- only by cooling them will you find the way back to your essence.
  • More than 12 ARTISTS from Mexico, Chile & USA,  with more than 40 of their works hidden in the labyrinths.
